name: Rogue Mind
description:
RougeMind is a action rouge like game set in world where the Anti Procrastination Agency control workforce’s with ‘drugs’. After consuming a large quantity of drugs to counter act the governments mind control you must help office worker Tom shoot and Slash through a dungeon filled with strange creatures inside his own mind!

Find and purchase new performance enhancing drugs for different buffs and abilities, and purchase desk toys for your office to give a helpful boost to your runs through Tom's mind. Delve through the caverns of Tom's brain fighting off his own imagination before finally fighting off his Boss, The Big Sam!

(The game is still in development, we have a lot of work left to do. We would love to hear any feedback you have!)
